notes.title: Authorsâ€™ contributions
notes.p: BLV, SAM, GVA, DAKB and LSP designed the study. BJV, SAM, GVA and LSP conducted the field work. AJ, GVA and DKAB identified the species. VGF, HG and MSC conducted the DNA metabarcoding. BJV, SAM, VGF, DKAB, MSC and LSP wrote the manuscript. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
